wikitext.*:
{{year-header}}
==January==
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 43|''Amon Hen'' 43]] is published.
* '''?''' - ''[[Quettar]]'' is founded.

==February==
* '''[[9 February|9]]''' - Actor [[Heron Carvic]] dies.
* '''[[29 February|29]]''' - ''[[A Reader's Guide to The Silmarillion]]'' is published.  

==May==
* '''[[11 May|11]]''' - [[The Return of the King (1980 film)]] is released on VHS in the United States.
* '''[[22 May|22]]''' - Actress [[Nazanin Boniadi]] is born.
* '''[[28 May|28]]''' - Second edition of ''[[The Languages of Tolkien's Middle-earth]]'' is published.
* '''[[29 May|29]]''' - ''[[Poems and Stories]]'' is published.
* '''[[29 May|29]]''' - Actor [[Adam Brown]] is born.
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 44|''Amon Hen'' 44]] is published.

==July==
* '''[[25 July|25]]-[[28 July|28]]''' - [[Mythcon 11]].
* '''[[26 July|26]]-[[3 August|3 Aug]]''' - At the Griffoni Film Festival, [[Ralph Bakshi]] wins the [[wikipedia:Giffoni Film Festival|Golden Gryphon]] for ''[[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)|The Lord of the Rings]]''.
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 45|''Amon Hen'' 45]] is published.

==August==
* '''[[22 August|22]]''' -  Actor [[Norman Shelley]] dies.
* '''[[29 August|29]]''' - Author [[Douglas C. Kenney]] dies.
* '''[[31 August|31]]''' - [[Amon Hen 46|''Amon Hen'' 46]] is published.

==September==
* '''[[26 September|26]]-[[28 September|28]]''' - [[Oxonmoot 1980]].
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 15|''Mallorn'' 15]] is published.

==October==
* '''[[2 October|2]]''' - ''[[Unfinished Tales]]'' is published in the UK.
* '''?''' - ''[[A Walk Through the Shire]]'' is published.

==November==
* '''[[6 November|6]]''' - [[Nevill Coghill]], [[Inklings|Inkling]], dies
* '''[[18 November|18]]''' - ''[[Unfinished Tales]]'' is published in the US.
* '''?''' - [[Amon Hen 47|''Amon Hen'' 47]] is published.

==December==
* '''[[21 December|21]]''' - The premiere of the first episode of German radio serial adaptation ''[[Der Hobbit (1980 German radio series)|Der Hobbit]]'', a production of public broadcaster Westdeutscher Rundfunk Kôln (WDR Kôln).
* '''[[26 December|26]]''' - Conclusion of the German radio serial adaptation ''[[Der Hobbit (1980 German radio series)|Der Hobbit]]''.
* '''[[29 December|29]]''' - [[Amon Hen 48|''Amon Hen'' 48]] is published.

==?==
* '''?''' - [[The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[The J.R.R. Tolkien Desk Calendar 1981]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[Shire Calendar 1981]] is released.
* '''?''' - [[The 1981 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar - The Lord of the Rings]] is released.
* '''?''' - ''[[The Lord of the Rings Souvenir booklet commemorating twenty five years of its publication]]'' is published.
* '''?''' - [[Mallorn 14|''Mallorn'' 14]] is published.
